ai-iti57:1.1_0: This was said by the Buddha, the Perfected One: that is what I heard.
ai-iti57:2.3_0: The defilements of sensuality, desire to be reborn, and ignorance.
ai-iti57:2.5_0: That is what the Buddha said.
ai-iti57:3.1_0: “One who has ended the defilement of sensuality,
ai-iti57:3.3_0: and whose desire to be reborn is finished—
ai-iti57:4.1_0: This too was spoken by the Blessed One: that is what I heard.
